issue.title: Collision system seems not work when there are joints in the model [Gazebo 1.5]

content.raw:
Collision checking is turned off between links of the same model by default. Try using the [self_collide](http://gazebosim.org/sdf/dev.html#self_collide85) tag if you want your model's links to collide with each other.

Unless this tag doesn't work this is not a bug.
content.html:
Collision checking is turned off between links of the same model by default. Try using the self_collide tag if you want your model's links to collide with each other.

Unless this tag doesn't work this is not a bug.
